data.name: Undercover Agent DLC
data.detailed_description:
This DLC allows you to unlock the 18 + adult content.
It includes several sex scenes, new ends and new CGs.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC allows you to unlock the 18 + adult content.
It includes several sex scenes, new ends and new CGs.
data.short_description: This DLC allows you to unlock the 18 + adult content. It includes several sex scenes, new ends and new CGs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains pornographic content, cartoon pornographic content and sexual assault / violence. Only for adults.
